mapper.select:
select
from SYS_FUNCTION WHERE FUNCTION_TYPE <> '1015' order by FUNCTION_TYPE,SEQ

select
from SYS_FUNCTION WHERE FUNCTION_TYPE = '1015' and PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by SEQ
